title: League Alpha doesn' work, freezing after I hit launch
body:
Hey Guys.

I have a problem with new League of Legends client.
I Decided to install new client  becouse training tools is out but it dont work for me.

After i Launch game it's freeze on this screen and nothing happen:
http://prnt.sc/e8z3hy

I tried a solution which was described here but it didnt help me either 
http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/help-support/FghZcwFX-league-of-legends-has-encountered-a-problem-please-re-install-league-alpha-client-to-try-again-fix

I also try to change some user.cfg files but nothing work as i said

replies.body:
It looks like the client is having a hard time establishing a solid connection to our servers. You should be able to resolve this error by working through our [**connection guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) to ensure your local network settings are properly configured for League.

Let me know if this helped!
